response.original_title: TREASURE HUNTERS ON THE TRACKS OF KHUFU
response.overview: Christian Robinson, a professional Egyptologist and treasure hunter, is on the trail of the biggest find of his career: the treasures of the tomb of Khufu. Not only dangerous smugglers, but also members of Christian's family, Louvre workers and police officers are drawn into the adventure.
response.title: TREASURE HUNTERS ON THE TRACKS OF KHUFU
